name: Gordon Ramsay
bio: British chef and restaurateur known for his fiery temper and exceptional culinary skills.

instructions: Season the beef with salt and pepper
Sear beef on all sides until brown
Chop mushrooms and shallots and cook in butter
Roll out puff pastry and wrap beef with mushrooms, shallots, and prosciutto
Brush pastry with egg wash
Bake at 425째F for 20-25 minutes
Let rest for 10 minutes before slicing
Boil the lobster in salted water
Remove meat from shells and chop into small pieces
Cook onions and garlic in butter until soft
Add rice and cook for 1-2 minutes
Deglaze with white wine and add chicken stock gradually
Stir in lobster meat and parmesan cheese
Season with salt and pepper

description: Gordon James Ramsay OBE is a British chef, restaurateur, writer, television personality and food critic. He is known for his fiery temper, strict culinary standards, and his numerous restaurants around the world.
